text: For the cap of the bottle. I think I would model the lip hook thing by using only the outside faces and then when I'm done extrude the faces inwards and begin filling the faces. The shape I would just extrude the faces up and then make the edge flow follows the shape

If that makes sense. I can try modelling an example of this if you want. Also it doesn't matter to much with the bottle as I don't think it will deform. But normally it good to keep your quads as square as possible. If this is for games I would normally just say no as polycount is a valuable
Oh ok! Thatâ€™s great help thank you, I will try that when I get the chance!
